capacity.description: The number of people who can attend. If not set then there is no limit.

description.description: A statement or tag line describing the activity

end_time.description: The time the activity is going to start

show_to_attendee.description: You can choose to show this activity to attendees. If shown, it will be listed on their ticket. Default: `false`

question_ids.description: The `Questions` to be asked to those who register for this activity. Format: An array of `Question` IDs.

release_ids.description: The `Releases` that are part of the activity. Format: An array of `Release` IDs.

start_time.description: The time the activity is going to start
